translations: n．深渊（abyss的复数形式）：深不见底的深渊，通常用于形容深海、深洞或无尽的空间。
· The divers explored the dark abysses of the ocean.
潜水员探索了黑暗的海洋深渊。

sentences.sentence: Good thoughts have their abysses as well as evil ones.
sentences.translation: 善的思想和恶的思想一样，也是深不可测的。

sentences.sentence: Airflows create not just towers and hills, but also some breaches and abysses.
sentences.translation: 气流不仅仅创造了云塔和斜坡，同样导致了缺口。

sentences.sentence: Mysterious exchange of the abysses of the soul with the abysses of the universe!
sentences.translation: 心灵的幽奥和宇宙的幽奥的神秘的交往！
